content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #225

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Missing diagram and descriptions for "Driving" and "Synchronizing"

Submitted by Greg Staudenmaier on behalf of @IoanaSingureanu (ioana.singureanu@bookzurman.com )
Chapter/section:
Url:
Type: A-T
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Missing diagram and descriptions for "Driving" and "Synchronizing"

Comment: ![FHIRcast overview](img/colorful overview diagram.png) - the diagram is not rendered. The diagram also lacks any description (i.e. what's a driving app vs. syncrhonizing app and why are are they different)

Existing wording: ![FHIRcast overview](img/colorful overview diagram.png)

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #225

wmaethner commented on Issue #225

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Anthony Julian moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano

Disposition: Not related
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

Closing
